name: Nigiri Sushi Platter and Chirashi
description: A variety of nigiri sushi and a chirashi bowl.

name: Nigiri Sushi and Maki Rolls 1
description: Slices of salmon, tuna, and shrimp nigiri, accompanied with maki (sushi rolls) with fillings wrapped in rice and nori.

name: Nigiri Sushi and Maki Rolls 2
description: Slices of salmon, tuna, and shrimp nigiri, with maki (sushi rolls) with fillings wrapped in rice and nori.

name: Salmon Sashimi
description: Salmon sashimi is a popular choice due to its rich, buttery texture and vibrant color.

name: Crunchy Roll
description: Roll coated in tempura batter and fried to create a crispy exterior, drizzled with spicy mayo and eel sauce.

name: White Fish Sashimi
description: Thin slices of white fish, served raw on a bed of shredded daikon radish.
